info.name: purple google apps
info.description:
makes google apps purple & lowercase!
currently includes: 
- google search
- google docs
- more coming soon
info.additionalInfo:
credits to stickybiscuits for some of the code

v0.1 (beta)
- purple google docs

v0.2 (beta)
- purple + lowercase google search
- fixed gmail bug

v0.3 (beta)
- lowercase google docs
- google docs homepage bug fixed
